title: mastery score overlapping in client.
body:
in the client when you hover over your overview mastery score the little mastery icon and the number of mastery points you have for that champion overlaps if you have over 100k mastery points. 

just thought you guys should know.

replies.body: It’s just the top 3 not 100k, I have 25k mastery and I have the same bug
Ya think riots gonna fix this? DO YOU THINK THIS WILL BE FIXED AT ALL? Unless it involves a skin or money, riot won't even peek at it.

> [{quoted}](name=Starmfangy,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=zgs5b67F,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-02-20T00:05:28.457+0000)
>
> Ya think riots gonna fix this? DO YOU THINK THIS WILL BE FIXED AT ALL? 


They are.
